body.name: TOTO Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT and SoftClose Seat, WASHLET+ Ready, Cotton White - MS776124CSG#01
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 48 mins
features: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE WITH LESS FREQUENT CLEANING - TORNADO FLUSH swirls water in a circular pattern to fully wash the bowl surface. CEFIONTECT is an ultra-smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking so that it is easily washed away.

REDUCE WATER USEAGE WITHOUT SACRIFICE - The 1.6 gallon per flush Drake enables you to save water without worrying about diminished performance. The Drake features a wide 3 inch flush valve and a siphon jet bowl that gets the job done in one flush.

STYLISH AND MODERN DESIGN - Update your oasis with this stylish design that couples well with any bathroom décor. The elongated bowl provides added space for comfort. The toilet fits into 12 inch rough-in installations and has a left-hand trip lever.

WASHLET+ COMPATIBILTY FOR WHEN YOU ARE READY TO UPGRADE - This model will include the Drake tank, bowl, and SoftClose seat. Complete your toilet with an optional WASHLET+ bidet seat upgrade. WASHLET+ models enable concealment of the cord and hose.
body.description: The TOTO® Drake® Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF TORNADO FLUSH® Toilet with CEFIONTECT® and SoftClose® Seat, WASHLET®+ Ready is a beautifully designed high profile toilet. Featuring TOTO’s TORNADO FLUSH®, a rimless, hole-free design with dual-nozzles that creates a centrifugal washing action that assists in rinsing the bowl more efficiently. This version of the TOTO Drake includes CEFIONTECT®, a layer of exceptionally smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking to the ceramic. CEFIONTECT, coupled with TORNADO FLUSH, assists to reduce the frequency of toilet cleanings, minimizing the usage of water, harsh chemicals, and time required for cleaning. This version of the Drake has a left-hand chrome trip lever. TOTO WASHLET+ toilets feature a channel on the bowl surface to help conceal the optional WASHLET+ bidet seat supply line and power cords for seamless integration. The Drake two piece toilet includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, toilet bolt caps and SoftClose toilet seat. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts, water supply lines, and optional T40 WASHLET+ electronic bidet seat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us At TOTO, we design simple, brilliant, elegant solutions for basic human needs. That means a TOTO bathroom is always more than a routine. It’s a ritual where every innovation, every detail, is designed with you in mind. For over 100 years TOTO has been dedicated to improving lives around the globe through tirelessly designing and engineering products that deliver innovative technology while still maintaining the beauty expected from TOTO. POWERFUL PERFORMANCE, DEPENDABLE CLEAN Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF Toilet The Drake Two-Piece Elongated Standard Height TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT is intentionally designed with cleanliness in mind. The Drake features a rimless, hole-free design with dual nozzles that create a highly efficient centrifugal washing action for better bowl rinse after each flush. With the assistance of the CEFIONTECT exceptionally smooth glaze, waste is prevented from adhering to the surface, ensuring the toilet bowl stays cleaner longer. Designed with quality materials to ensure longevity and durability. Available in additional colors and features to maximize benefits and coordinate with all bathroom spaces. SoftClose toilet seat is included to quietly and safely close lid

Effective, Efficient, and Environmentally Focused Cleaning System Powerful Flushing System Our TORNADO FLUSH flushing system generates 360-degrees of cleaning power that reaches every spot. Advanced Clean Technology Our CEFIONTECT ceramic glaze minimizes waste from sticking to porous ceramic surfaces. Improved Water Spot A large water spot that reduces the places where waste can cling to the bowl. Simplified Cleaning The rimless design eliminates places where waste can build up and makes it easier to clean.

Everything You'll Need to Experience Next-Level Clean Everything you need is within reach! This model will come with tank, bowl, and SoftClose seat included. Simply purchase wax ring and mounting bolts. Elevate your experience by upgrading with a WASHLET+ Electronic Bidet seat, delivering next-level clean and a pampered spa-like feeling after each use.
Your Toilet is Ready for Upgrade

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Clean modern design. Note that it does not come with a filler/cap for the optional washlet so you will have a visible hole near the top of the seat when the lid is closed. They sell a cap but when I checked it was like $20 for a plastic part that likely cost them Pennie’s. That should really be included with the toilet.Other than that it’s a great unit flush is powerful bowl stays clean. I may one day add the Washlet feature so it’s nice to have a toilet that is made for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Give the latch One Tap and the toilet will flush.
reviews.reviewText: Best flushing toilet I've ever had my whole life. I'm done with those toilets with the little pin holes where the water weeps out and you have to hold the latch for 15 seconds to get a flush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken toilet tank
reviews.reviewText: One of the ranks was broken on delivery still in the box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely well engineered and constructed
reviews.reviewText: This has to be the most well thought out and nicely made toilet ever. From simplicity of install to the seat to the water saving flush, I’m thoroughly impressed. Everything has been made with attention to detail, quality and longevity. Hard to get excited about a toilet, but this is about as close as it gets. Well done Toto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toto is the best
reviews.reviewText: Replaced a failing four year old Kohler with this one. The install was a breeze and it works great. Toto is the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good toilets but tank wobbles
reviews.reviewText: We ordered 3 of these for a new house. The fill valve in one was defective (would not stop filling) and had to be replaced. On all three models, the tank wobbles a bit but we fear over-tigthening and cracking the tank. The flush system is interesting and they look nice. I expect they'll be easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy install, powerful flush function, comfortable seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TOTO: Japan's standard of excellence
reviews.reviewText: Having witnessed Toto's excellent qualities in its homeland, I was very pleased to find out that Toto products are now available in the United States --- I only wish that other Japanese companies would do likewise; can you imagine how great it would be to have, for instance, Sanyo washing machines and dryers available rather than the dreck sold here, such as General Electric's execrable products?That said, I think that Kohler is also doing well with their recent offerings in bathroom fixtures. I am very glad that I won't have to ever again buy an "American Standard" product; it's embarrassing how badly made their toilets are. I have suffered for decades with their "contractor specials" that I would have replaced in a moment had I known that Toto was available, or that Kohler had such superior products.Thank you, Toto!
